## Exercises

1. Install the "ALL" Bioconductor package.

```{r eval=FALSE}
BiocManager::install(c("ALL"))
```

2. Use library(ALL) and data(ALL) to load the ALL ExpresssionSet.

```{r}
library(ALL)
data(ALL)
```

3. Use pData to examine the phenotype data.

```{r}
str(pData(ALL))
```

4. Load and experiment with the Heatplus library to make heatmaps.  

```{r}
# find the 128 most variant genes
top128 <- order(apply(exprs(ALL),1,var, na.rm=TRUE), decreasing = TRUE)[1:128]
ALL.top <- ALL[top128,]
library(Heatplus)
myMap <- regHeatmap(exprs(ALL.top))
plot(myMap)
```
